titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duties on sumatriptan succinate (bulk and dosage forms).

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9553-9554)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on (3-(2-(dimethylamino)ethyl)-N-methyl-1H-indole-5-methanesulphonamide, (1:1) succinate (sumatriptan succinate in bulk and dosage forms).
